attributes.action: Publish a petition which aims to ban standing charges on utilities
attributes.additional_details: The Govt. know the situation and are supposed to be caring for the poor, needy, disabled and elderly. They must act against enormously rich companies and protect the consumer.
attributes.background: The standing charges on utilities are unfair and regressive. They hit the poor more than they hit the rich.  - The regulator was not thinking about the poor when he permitted the imposition of the standing charge!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Decisions about standing charges are a matter for utility providers and Ofgem, not the UK Government or Parliament.

The price cap is a cap on a unit of gas and electricity, with standing charges taken into account. Find out more about the energy price cap, including how it includes standing charges, here: https://www.ofgem.gov.uk/check-if-energy-price-cap-affects-you
